<style>
/* pill */
.ann{
  position:relative;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;gap:.6rem;
  max-width:820px;margin:14px auto 6px;padding:.45rem .75rem;
  font:500 .92rem/1.2 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  border-radius:999px;border:1px solid #dbe7ff;
  background:linear-gradient(180deg,#f4f8ff 0%,#eef5ff 100%);
  box-shadow:0 1px 4px rgba(0,0,0,.04);
}
.ann__dot{width:.5rem;height:.5rem;border-radius:50%;background:#0d6efd;box-shadow:0 0 0 4px rgba(13,110,253,.12)}
.ann__text{color:#0b2e66}
.ann__link{padding:.2rem .55rem;border-radius:.5rem;border:1px solid #cfe0ff;text-decoration:none;font-weight:600}
.ann__link:hover{background:#fff;border-color:#b9d1ff}
.ann__close{margin-left:.4rem;border:0;background:transparent;font-size:1.05rem;line-height:1;cursor:pointer;color:#5c728a;opacity:.75}
.ann__close:hover{opacity:1}

/* reopen toggle */
.ann-toggle{
  position:fixed;right:16px;bottom:18px;z-index:9999;
  padding:.35rem .6rem;border-radius:999px;border:1px solid #e0e8ff;
  background:#f6f9ff;color:#0b2e66;font:600 .88rem/1 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif;
  box-shadow:0 6px 18px rgba(13,110,253,.12);
}
.ann-toggle:hover{background:#ffffff}
@media (max-width:640px){ .ann{max-width:92vw} }
@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark){
  .ann{border-color:#2b4875;background:linear-gradient(180deg,#0e2138,#102847)}
  .ann__text{color:#cfe0ff}
  .ann__link{border-color:#3b5d8f}
  .ann-toggle{background:#0f2340;color:#d7e6ff;border-color:#2b4875}
}
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  const KEY='ann_state_v2'; // {dismissed: "0|1"}
  const AUTO_HIDE_MS=6000;

  const ann = document.querySelector('.ann');
  const toggle = document.querySelector('.ann-toggle');

  // helpers
  const qs = new URLSearchParams(location.search);
  const forceShow = qs.get('showAnn')==='1';
  const state = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(KEY) || '{"dismissed":"0"}');

  function showAnn(){
    ann.style.display='flex';
    toggle.hidden = true;
    localStorage.setItem(KEY, JSON.stringify({dismissed:"0"}));
  }
  function hideAnn(persist=true){
    ann.style.display='none';
    toggle.hidden = false;
    if(persist) localStorage.setItem(KEY, JSON.stringify({dismissed:"1"}));
  }

  // init
  if (forceShow || state.dismissed!=="1") {
    showAnn();
  } else {
    hideAnn(false);
  }

  // close button
  ann.querySelector('.ann__close')?.addEventListener('click', ()=> hideAnn(true));
  // reopen
  toggle.addEventListener('click', ()=> showAnn());

  // auto hide with hover pause
  let timer;
  function startTimer(){
    clearTimeout(timer);
    timer = setTimeout(()=> hideAnn(true), AUTO_HIDE_MS);
  }
  function stopTimer(){ clearTimeout(timer); }
  if (ann.style.display!=='none') startTimer();
  ann.addEventListener('mouseenter', stopTimer);
  ann.addEventListener('mouseleave', startTimer);
})();
</script>
